text: Pakistan International Airlines Flight 8303 was a flight in Pakistan. It was between Allama Iqbal International Airport in Lahore, Punjab and Jinnah International Airport in Karachi, Sindh. The plane crashed on its final approach into Karachi in the Model Colony area of the city on 22 May 2020. The crash killed 97 people of the 99 people on board and one on the ground. It injured 9 others: 2 on the plane and 7 on the ground. ==References== Category:2020 disasters in Asia International Airlines Flight 8303 Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in Asia Category:2020s in Sindh Category:Karachi Category:May 2020 events Category:2020 in Pakistan Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2020
title: Pakistan International Airlines Flight 8303
